rule: The output category must be a single word that matches exactly one of these four categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech.
input: Earthquake shakes major city, causing substantial damage
validityText:
The input is a string which fits the general requirement as specified. It represents a news article headline, describing an event - an earthquake affecting a major city and causing substantial damage. This input text pertains to a world event, which fits within the category of "World" according to the provided input specification. There are no additional elements of the input specification that this text violates.

OK
